inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getDirectConnectGatewayAttachment.

dxGatewayId.description: Identifier of the Direct Connect Gateway.

filters.description: Configuration block(s) for filtering. Detailed below.

tags.description: Map of tags, each pair of which must exactly match a pair on the desired Transit Gateway Direct Connect Gateway Attachment.

transitGatewayId.description: Identifier of the EC2 Transit Gateway.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getDirectConnectGatewayAttachment.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment
